QuestData.Title: Mistress of Lies
QuestData.Description:
If you are done dealing with dese peasant loa, den perhaps you can help with my own loa: Shadra.
My "high" priestess, Yazma, is behind all of dis. If she is having her minions slay other loa, den I can only guess she is also trying to sacrifice my own loa as well.
Shadra's shrine is on de northwest side of de Garden of the Loa. You must stop her from slaying de Mistress of Spies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Yazma and Vol'kaal in the Garden of the Loa.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wardruid Loti in the Garden of the Loa.
